name: brazier
description: A large metal stand used to contain a fire.  Fires set in a brazier will not spread to surrounding flammable objects.

name: metal butchering rack
description: Metal butchering rack designed to hang the carcass in the air.  It is folded for easy transportation and can be deployed as a furniture.

name: tourist table
description: Metal tourist table for off-road trips.  It is folded for easy transportation and can be deployed as a furniture.
